entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Mono Android] GC failures on CI #58409
  • ASP.NET 4.8 EventCounter does not contain methods #58408
  • Assertion failed 'm_compGenTreeID == m_compiler->compGenTreeID' during 'Morph - Inlining' #58397
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '(m_firstNode == m_lastNode) || (Contains(m_lastNode))' #58396
    6.0.0
  • [mono] Crash when calling an interface method on a struct through a generic default interface method #58394
    6.0.0
  • crossgen2 JIT stress testing #58388
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][WASM] Microbenchmark fails with wasm-aot with 'Invalid Cast' error #58387
  • File.ReadAllBytes* should support non-seekable files #58383
    7.0.0
  • Relax RandomAccess type requirements, make all Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #58381
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AddressFamily.Vsock, AddressFamily.HyperV #58378
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce RandomAccess.SetLength(SafeFileHandle handle) method #58376
    7.0.0
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] assertion failure with random edge counts on bytemark #58375
    7.0.0
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces on Android Throws Null Exception #58374
  • JIT: pgo test failure in System.Runtime.Tests.dll #58373
    6.0.0
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] Random edge counts assert in System.Text.Encoding.Tests #58372
    7.0.0
  • JIT: [QualityWeek] Random edge count assert in Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core.Test #58371
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose SafeFileHandle.CanSeek #58370
    7.0.0
  • JIT [QualityWeek]: Random edge count assert in System.Text.Json.Tests #58368
    7.0.0
  • [Libraries][iOSSimulator] System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests ValidAccessLevelCombinations UnauthorizedAccessException thrown #58367
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide MemoryMarshal.Cast(Memory) method or alternative to asynchrously fill an array #58363
    Future
  • Incorrect ordering of Slovak words in F# and C# #58362
    Future
  • "Build Cross OS Linux-musl DAC for Windows" step failed in CI #58358
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Send_0ByteSend_Success #58356
    Future
  • Test failure: ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException #58355
    Future
  • Test failure: SendAsync_MultipleOutstandingSendOperations_Throws #58354
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow user to handle custom System.CodeDom.CodeExpression and System.CodeDom.CodeStatement. #58351
  • Test failure: GetResponseAsync_UseDefaultCredentials_ExpectSuccess #58349
    Future
  • Support static binding for serialization using System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer #58348
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: SendReceive_Concurrent_Success #58347
    Future
  • [Feature Request] Ignore properties when binding with Options service #58384
  • ILLinkTrimAssembly condition applies to NetCoreAppCurrent only #58343
    6.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/ICustomMarshaler/Primitives/ICustomMarshaler_TargetUnix/ICustomMarshaler_TargetUnix.sh #58335
  • Delete Microsoft.IO.Redist.csproj #58334
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Unicode Regular Expression for Japanese characters #45805
    Future
  • Failed to determine location for extracting embedded files (again) #58389
    7.0.0
  • Test failure:Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_34094\\Test34094\\Test34094.cmd #57458
    7.0.0
  • WaitAsync - optimize for no timeout and non-cancellable CancellationToken #58401
  • System.Collections - Undoc 6.0 APIs #54869
    6.0.0
  • System.Drawing.Common does not display some characters. #58395
    7.0.0
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58141
  • Bundle_extraction_is_reused intermittently fails with "text file is busy" #44657
  • DotNet 6 Preview 7: Inconsistent Get/Set Timestamps when Symlinks are Involved #58012
    Future
  • Example usage of NullabilityInfoContext fails on preview.7 #57920
    6.0.0
  • aspnet core 3.1 linux ThreadPool.SetMinThreads is not work #1872
    Future
  • API Proposal: Value factory ctor on System.Threading.AsyncLocal<T> #58332
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols kerberos authentication for ldapconnection in kubernetes #57901
  • Empty string cannot be parsed to a nullable int with System.Text.Json with JsonNumberHandling.AllowReadingFromString #58289
  • The SSL connection could not be established after bypassing validation #58251
    7.0.0
  • ARM64: Assertion failed 'interval->isWriteThru'/runtime crash in release #58083
    6.0.0
  • [mono] Implement Environment.GetFolderPath for Android #35490
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream test fails #53087
    Future
  • HttpClient with client certificate - stop send of intermediate certificate #57989
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'offset != BAD_STK_OFFS' #57767
    7.0.0
  • workload notfound in stalling Workload microsoft-net-sdk-blazorwebassembly-aot #58325
  • iOS: LLVM fails for ios-arm #58112
    6.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler allocating more per HTTP/1.1 request due to additional async state machines #57977
    6.0.0
  • String.Equals(other, Ordinal) could be faster if the length comparsion was moved up #58310

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `Zero` property to `Quaternion`. #58406
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Pass a null getter\setter with [JsonIgnore] and src gen #58405
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • DO NOT MERGE: Measuring macOS build agent performance #58402
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete redundant interop tests #58400
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix detection of unsupported links #58399
    area-System.IO
  • Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58398
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId when using Local Time Zone #58392
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fix detection of unsupported links #58391
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    area-System.Reflection
  • Set values for Nuget.Client EXPERIMENTAL_HTTP_RETRY #58386
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [Libraries][Android] Fix alignment for padding System.Decimal #58380
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-android
  • Remove conditional compilation conditions that are no longer possible #58377
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix ep_rt_atomic_compare_exchange_size_t in Mono EventPipe shim. #58369
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add s390x support in a few places in eng/native build scripts #58366
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58364
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58361
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Remove `Microsoft.IO.Redist`. #58359
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • In reset_memory, check settings.entry_memory_load ... #58350
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Don't generate safepoints inside write barrier wrapper #58346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Run lsof after bundling for more info #58341
    NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Use OutputRid in test projects #58340
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix WhenAllOrAnyFailed to not eat OperationCanceledExceptions #58338
    test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58336
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Nullable improvements for `Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegment` №2 #58308
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Take the memory operand size for some hw intrinsic instructions #57603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Add s390x RIDs to DotNetHost* packages #58365
    area-Setup
  • mono.proj: Only run strip in Release config for Apple platforms #58385
    area-Build-mono
  • Refactor fgInitArgInfo to track non standard arg kinds #58324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58064
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Typo fixed #58393
    area-Meta
  • Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58036
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Fix `ThreadPool.SetMinThreads` and `SetMaxThreads` to return false when they don't override the preconfigured value #57699
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Turn off release branch in perf-slow.yml #58379
    tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete test projects under src/tests/hosting #58304
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Remove PEDecoder::HasNativeHeader (always false) #58303
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Conditionally build allconfigurations in source-build #58122
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add s390x RIDs to DotNetHost* packages #56423
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add s390x support in a few places in eng/native build scripts #56426
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Don't build ReferenceSystemPrivateCoreLib tests with Mono #58232
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] browser-bench sample URL task argument #57527
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ep_rt_atomic_compare_exchange_size_t in Mono EventPipe shim. #58164
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58280
    area-codeflow
  • Set _ep_arch_info for s390x #56427
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58215
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Skip System.Text.Json tests on iOS/tvOS that don't work #58276
    area-System.Text.Json, os-ios
  • Only look for exceptVars when resolving live-out EH vars #58243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set default TargetArchicture when building on s390x host #56425
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Support public key token in DefineDynamicAssembly #58283
    area-System.Reflection-mono, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Reenabled ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream #58041
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Only report live ranges for allocated variables #57843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix IDE0062 warning in NumberFormatInfo.cs #58337
    area-System.Globalization
  • [mono] Replace -disable-fp-elim with -frame-pointer=all #58192
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Remove two async state machines for typical HTTP/1.1 request path #58252
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Add internal AppExecLink support to link APIs #58233
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Add QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync #58236
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58296
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix a minor assert issue in long decomposition #57326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • roll r2r jobs into crossgen2-outerloop #58282
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • A few more regex test #58154

  • Update native COM server tests to execute directly instead of using the Exe launcher program. #58302

  • Share compiler configurations across libs & coreclr #58096
    community-contribution
  • Re-enable Vector3DistanceTest #57077
    area-System.Numerics
  • Expose cross-platform helpers for Vector64, Vector128, and Vector256 #53450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Update `GetCurrFrame()` assert during x86 function unwind #58323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix fgValueNumberArrIndexVal for wide reads #58309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add managed implementation of Math.ILogB and MathF.ILogB #56236
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize TimeSpan.FromX for constant input #55745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Additional trimming for EventSource.IsSupported feature switch #56564

  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669

  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183

  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167

  • [Stress] Enable POST by disabling InternalServerError suppression #58110
    area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP: Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106

  • Enable runtime tests with closed issues #57720

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: Crossgen2ToolExecutable <- Should this be running for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime ? #1475
  • [NativeAOT] Generic virtual method pointer lookup failure #1473
  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #1471

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Bug on enumeration (Dispose) #1455

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge runtime-main into feature/s390x #1474
  • Bug fix of dfa lazy dot star #1472

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to June #1469
  • Merge runtime-main into feature/regexsrm #1470

Updated

  • Update LLVM 5.0 -> 12.0 #1461
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hide `--sdk-version` parameter to workload commands #20357
  • Support multi-targeting for Roslyn components #20355
    6.0.1xx
  • Garbage collection output does not list the pack IDs #20350
  • Reenable TestPreviewFeatures test #20325

Closed

  • `dotnet workload install` gives incorrect error message if `--sdk-version` specified matches the feature band but doesn't exactly match the SDK version #20281
  • `--sdk-version` parameter for workload commands should probably be renamed to `--sdk-feature-band` or similar #20282
  • --interactive switch not displaying device flow in version '6.0.100-preview.7.21379.14' #20332
  • build .NET Framework WPF project in linux docker container #19747
    Discussion
  • Run multiple test assemblies in parallel with dotnet test and NUnit #20115
  • [6.0.1xx-RC1] Add platform support to workload pack records #20202

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove explicitly configured LangVersion from RazorSDK #20343
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Search for workloads based on description as well as id #20349
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove explicitly configured LangVersion from RazorSDK #20344
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hide workload list options only relevant to machine readable #20271
    Area-Workloads
  • Serve aspnet-browser-refresh.js from a rooted path #20150
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update global.json #20212
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Disable CA1416 for ProcessExtensions #20256
    Area-External
  • Support platform discriminator for workload pack records #20248
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Test driven RazorSourceGenerator incrementality #20209
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297

  • [Proposal]: [Indented Verbatim String] #4013
  • Champion "User-defined Positional Patterns" #1047
    Backlog
  • Proposal: `tail return` recursive calls #2304
    Backlog
  • Champion: "Allow Obsolete attribute on getters and setters" (16.3, Core 3) #2152
    8.0
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn doesn't handle dealing with an overrflow of the file change service buffer #56023
  • Issue using EnvDTE.CodeClass.AddFunction with .NET 6 projects when *.cs is not open #56018
  • Can the Formatter annotate nodes that it doesn't touch #56014
  • Use a BitVector instead of bool[] in MethodTypeInferrer.FixParameters #56012
  • `Nullable<T> ?? constant-expr` generates unnecessary temporary #56007
  • `Make container 'async'` try to insert an `async` at strange place #56006
  • Formatting doesn't work on multiline object initializer #56003

Closed

  • Missing System.Int32 type results in hitting compiler assertion #55990
    17.0
  • EnC - More attribute edit tests #54430
  • Import completion might benifit from persisting data to disk and pre-calculation #37197
    17.0
  • Use partial semantic model in completion providers #51407
    17.0
  • Reproducible VS crash when writing a foreach statement with tuple type inference #46165
    17.0
  • Treat files copied from a NuGet package content as generated #55992
  • StringBuilder with Interpolated String is malformatted #55927
  • String interpolation generates unexpected result in some situations #56004
  • Resource list should order by type. But, it's by name. #55632
  • Analyser IDE0130 fixer does not update namespaces correctly. #56002

PullRequests

Created

  • Preserve conversions on null literals before nullable type argument reinference #56022
    Area-Compilers
  • esnure path to global config file is correctly cased #56021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add readme.md listing breaking changes doc chronologically #56019
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56017
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56016
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove obsolete APIs #56015
    Area-IDE
  • Move Static Members: remove theming #56013
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • List patterns: unify with positional patterns on ITuple #56010
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: IOperation #56008
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Add more attribute tests for more things #55881
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, Next
  • Switch option to new name to fix build break #56020
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, Next
  • Warm up ImportCompletion cache in background when opening a document #55729
    Area-IDE, Next
  • React to string comparison changing on .NET Core #56011
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Move more code to async gotodef helpers #55929
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55985
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Specify forbidden zone for foreach deconstruction variables. #55982
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle XamlDefinition with line and column #55980
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Share 'when' expressions in DAGs when needed #55981
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, 17.0.P4
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens: Utilize frozen partial compilations #55976
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Move compiler test ref assemblies to NuPkg #55963
    Area-Compilers
  • Add generator driver cache to VBCSCompiler #55023
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870
    Area-IDE
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Experimentation options #55902
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE
  • Load solution options through RoslynUserOptionsPackage #55940
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Don't add async modifier for void return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly app fails with emscripten compiler options #35947
  • RoleExistsAsync method not working in Identity RoleManager #35946
  • Removing a document results in a lingering TagHelper #35945
    17.0-Preview4
  • Benchmark WorkspaceProjectStateChangeDetector and other highly dependent systems #35941
  • Fix Razor Apex Experimental test config #35940
    17.0-Preview4
  • ClickOnce support for AspNet+WinForm projects (Electron-like) #35935
  • Convert ProjectSnapshotChangeTrigger into an interface #35930
    Razor.Tooling
  • Prevent `InvokeVoidAsync` Return Value Serialization #35929
    6.0-rc2
  • How to pass a ComponentApplicationState to a component under test with bUnit? #35928
  • AddJsonOptions is run after Startup.Configure in integration tests #35923
  • 404 page with FallbackPolicy #35922
  • Send FLoC opt-out header by default #35921

Closed

  • API Review: WithTags, ITagsMetadata, TagsAttribute #35693
    6.0-rc2
  • Formatting @code block C# with extra block syntax can break formatting #34320
    17.0-Preview4
  • New templates have unnecessary using statement for OpenApi #35840
    6.0-rc2
  • Adding a new Razor component does not get picked up as a valid component until edit #33957
    17.0-Preview4
  • Remove RazorSemanticTokensLegendEndpoint #33119
    17.0-Preview4
  • EmailFactorFailsAfterSecurityStampChangeTest #35836
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup regression: plaintext #35912
  • Startup improvement: https #35895
  • Large app performance evaluation #31356
    17.0-Preview4
  • Blazor Hosted WebAssembly, Failing to resolve the route. #35589
  • Razor colorization issues #34770
    17.0-Preview4
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshot` Retained in Memory after Closing Solution and ForceGC #35865
    17.0-Preview4
  • [debugger][blazor webassembly] Breakpoints on server not hit #35773
  • dotnet watch can be extended #35837
  • View not found running on .Net6 rc1 #35452
